And I love to be living in the generation like ours because we have so much options. Only few people are realizing this. However, the real question really is, --if it works. The idea is only good by it's implementation. You are lucky enough if the ICO you've joined made true their promise. Let's pray that reOrder Gateway make true to their promise as well. This is a service that is badly needed now.

Author: PS92
Title: ☀️ [ANN] ☀️ reOrder Gateway - USA, NY based Startup|MVP - Nov. 7th
Body: I don't think it's in their power to increase minimum wage. Exactly the opposite: they help restaurants deal with the mandatory, legislative minimum wage increase:  "Additionally, R Coin is expected to enter into wide circulation as an effective automatization tool capable of helping business owners increase revenue and fight against $15 minimum wage law."  "Problem: Today, only large restaurants, in-store networks, and high-end establishments can offer high-quality service at reasonable prices. At the same time, small shops, restaurants, coffee shops, and bars are left behind, and in order to remain competitive, are forced to reduce operational costs via salary decreases and increased expectation of tips. Thus, the customer eventually ends up on the receiving end for low-quality service at high prices—and the business owner ends up losing this customer. (https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/wonk/wp/2017/04/24/minimum-wage-hikes-do-close-restaurants-just-not-the-ones-you-care-about/?utm_term=.5c04f54ad60f)"

Author: PS92
Title: ☀️ [ANN] ☀️ reOrder Gateway - USA, NY based Startup|MVP - Nov. 7th
Body: It's both and more!  It saves costs: -Cheaper payments, without banks/payment providers etc taking a cut. -Lower operational costs, because of less staff. That's always a plus, but with the upcoming 15% increase of the minimum wage will be even more important.  It brings in extra revenue: -Because of the better service, more people will eat at your place -Restaurants get a cut of the marketing/adds that are displayed on their terminals.  I believe that's how it works.

Author: Shilnov
Title: ☀️ [ANN] ☀️ reOrder Gateway - USA, NY based Startup|MVP - Nov. 7th
Body: My first draft of business model and technical requirements was dated 2014. First ugly MVP was made in beginning of 2015. At 2015 we found our investor and start developing all system. So in beginning of 2016 we has working prototype and start our tests in restaurants. At 2017 Company was formed with new core members and we decide to register reOrder Technologies Inc. Company was registered in Colorado and team reside in New York as starting point. Colorado is most popular jurisdiction for startups

Author: Shilnov
Title: ☀️ [ANN] ☀️ reOrder Gateway - USA, NY based Startup|MVP - Nov. 7th
Body: Thank you for your reply. Proof of concept is validation and verification process when your customers use product in pilot locations and it show positive traction. As we point before we have product which was passed validation process in test restaurants. After that we fixed all bugs and make changes in our model. Now we have to test our product in pilot 10 restaurants to verify our solution. Validation and verification will show proof of concept.  It's much more complex process to verify hardware product on market and start sell it. That's why we need funds

Author: viljy
Title: ☀️ [ANN] ☀️ reOrder Gateway - USA, NY based Startup|MVP - Nov. 7th
Body: In white paper, in the section TECHNICAL IMPLEMENTATION there is a diagram from which it is impossible to understand the functioning of the system at all. Next is a description of the system's operation, after reading that, you are convinced that the circuit is made poorly. It does not reflect the sequence of actions of the system. Also where are the figures from 20,000 transactions per day from 2,000 potential restaurants taken? There is no reason to think that these restaurants will be 2000. Also, the automatic creation of crypto-currency wallets and their connection to exchanges will not allow users to own private keys. All user tools will be in the management of the system. And what advantages does the restaurant visitor get from the introduction of an extra link between them? I see only extra expenses for the visitor.

Title: ☀️ [ANN] ☀️ reOrder Gateway - USA, NY based Startup|MVP - Nov. 7th
Body: Sorry for short description of the diagram. We will have more technical details after first stage of ICO when we hire crypto dev team and they will bring more specific details based on our description. Consider it as technical requirements. 2000 restaurants is only 5% of the NYC market (City of 5 boroughs only). Absolutely doeble Users will allow to store their private keys on reOrder prepaid cards. We have a credit card swiper on terminal Visitors advantage is: bonuses, discounts, lowering ticket price because of automation, higher quality of service Business advantage from cryptocurrency: no merchant fees between customer crypto-wallet and restaurant crypto-wallet which is usually 2,5%

Spreading like a wildfire. Would love a reaction on this brainfart by the team."  Get bonusses at one place and use them at another, all interchangeable and linked to eachother on your platform. All while advertising eachother's business. That would create cohesion in your local business community and create value for local customers.

Author: PS92
Title: ☀️ [ANN] ☀️ reOrder Gateway - USA, NY based Startup|MVP - Nov. 7th
Body: I dug around on your site a bit and am quite impressed. For once this is a project that's not all hype about decentralizing everything, but is realistic. Most people/businesses don't know and care about crypto and decentralization, but they do care about costs. If restaurants can save on staff by using the terminal that's a win, if they can save on transaction/banking costs that's a win, if they can earn through marketing on the terminal that's a win. Those savings can be passed on to customers, which is a win.  Plus, while RCO is used in the background, it looks like customers don't have to be familiar with crypto to use it, since fiat money is accepted as well. Not sure how this works though, could some of the devs explain the payment process with fiat/crypto?  The fact that they start local instead of global is cool too. If just one block in the whole NY district starts to use this product, it's a success. I can see a small bar that shows commercials for their neighbouring cab services on the terminal and creates some kind of bonus/saving deal with them. I think it's quite easy to implement this in such a system. If one block uses this stuff and people are saving points or whatever, it would be very attractive for adjacent blocks to enter. Spreading like a wildfire. Would love a reaction on this brainfart by the team.  It's a real world application that can have an impact immediately (and as a benefit (not a starting point) get people interested in crypto). It seems like they really did their homework on the numbers, but they can definitely improve on their marketing. Especially since the (first) ICO is so close. Could you maybe at least setup a newsletter to subscribe to and a Twitter account so people can retweet your announcements. I understand that the budget is low, but if people don't know you're around, it's hard to raise money.

Title: ☀️ [ANN] ☀️ reOrder Gateway - USA, NY based Startup|MVP - Nov. 7th

Author: Shilnov
Title: ☀️ [ANN] ☀️ reOrder Gateway - USA, NY based Startup|MVP - Nov. 7th
Body: Advertising have following features: Brand advertising: All vacant tables equipped with reOrder terminals will stream global brand advertisement widely visible like regular outdoors billboards. Buy time context advertisement: Introduced to the customer right before order placing, during the wait time or after order delivery. This format fits well for advertising and cross-marketing of local goods and services. Instant purchase: Ability to buy advertised products straight from the appearing advertisement using reOrder terminal connection to accept cryptocurrency and banking cards. This gives unmatched competitive advantage to any advertiser.  Yes convenience fee is on the restaurant customer. The fee for speed, better quality service, lowering waiter errors and lowering ticket total

Title: ☀️ [ANN] ☀️ reOrder Gateway - USA, NY based Startup|MVP - Nov. 7th
Body: Yes, waiter income is on $15 minimal wage law, government supports workers very well but not small business Digital menu is the software connected to our servers. While connection is lost no transactions can be made. But we plan to implement buffering method which is widely used in regular POS systems. It stores all transaction data inside when connection is lost and process it when connection will be established again

Author: Shilnov
Title: ☀️ [ANN] ☀️ reOrder Gateway - USA, NY based Startup|MVP - Nov. 7th
Body: Thank you for your question. Indeed automation on the tables is something that waiters don't want to see because they think there is no tips from there. We spoke with waiters and owners and find solution that satisfies both. Restaurant customers will pay lower tips while ordering about 5%-7% instead of 15%-20%  at least someone brought the dish and clean the table. So terminals is more helping solution nor abusing. In chase of savings business owners load staff and loose in quality of service. Self service terminals will equalize this balance

Title: ☀️ [ANN] ☀️ reOrder Gateway - USA, NY based Startup|MVP - Nov. 7th

Author: Immorta
Title: ☀️ [ANN] ☀️ reOrder Gateway - USA, NY based Startup|MVP - Nov. 7th
Body: There's few mechanisms for Company stability, reOrder Fiat-to-crypto Gateway and crypto "cashflow" that makes it tolerant to market fluctuations. :  The use of the infrastructure by all above-mentioned parties of retail, food, and cryptocurrency markets, 7 separate and independent markets to be exact : 1)restaurant management & automation, 2) retail management & automation, 3) in-store advertizment markets and plan to enter 4) foodtech automation, 5) food logistics & distribution automation, 6) cryptocurrencies infrastructure, 7) cryptocurrencies payment systems  - So development of the terminals network on one of those markets will make the whole system stronger, like total capitalization of the infrastructure will increase due to the growth of terminal base, extension of the services provided by it, and, as a result, growth in the number and involvement of the users of food and retail establishments and cryptocurrencies. - Market of public catering and food service will need the advantages of automation described above, regardless whether it is growing or falling. - The infrastructure may operate both on fiat and any crypto currencies, which makes it independent from cryptocurrencies in general and from the economic condition of specific tokens or payment methods. - The volatility of particular cryptocurrencies is automatically calculated in terminals at the moment of purchase (i.e. conversion into price-stabilizing crypto- and fiat currencies).  So the price of any cryptocurrency including main reOrder currency reCoin won't affects business or operational stability in reOrder fiat-to-cryptocurrency Gateway.

Body: Well, since restaurants doesn't accept crypto right now and it seams like they doesn't need crypto  - reOrder terminals is in the right position to introduce cryptocurrency to retail for 2 reasons : 1) So called "Last mile" problem for crypto projects and cryptocurrency holders 2) to add the circulational part of the token capitalization in cryptocurrencies and crypto-assets projects.  Our strategic advantages here: 1) right in the place and time where day-to-day transactions occurs, in restaurants and retail stores 2) Pushing cryptocurrency adoption instead of attracting it.

Author: Immorta
Title: ☀️ [ANN] ☀️ reOrder Gateway - USA, NY based Startup|MVP - Nov. 7th
Body: Also we envision few possible scenarios for the reOrder payment terminals usage while saving restaurant's money:  In the restaurant (on the table): A customer takes the table with the installed terminal, looks through the menu, orders the dishes and waits for the order. The formed order is sent to the receipt printer in the kitchen, where it is immediately processed. The cook informs the busboy that the order is ready and he completes the cycle by delivering the dishes to the customer. Once the meal is over, the customer pays for the order with a bank card and rates the quality of food and service using the internal rating system.  Here reOrder Terminals save waiter's time and money while taking hanwriting order, moving it to kitchen, using traditional PoS to enter plates and drinks positions, print the check, taking aditional orders, splitting checks, collecting credit cards and process them.

Author: Shilnov
Title: ☀️ [ANN] ☀️ reOrder Gateway - USA, NY based Startup|MVP - Nov. 7th
Body: The whole point of bringing cryptocurrency to the end user is to give them convenient and easy way to use it. Easy as they use credit cards day by day. That's why we going to deploy our own blockchain system and implement our own wallets attached to their accounts. So any user at anytime can use R coins to pay trough our terminals using their credit cards or prepaid reOrder card where all processing will be done automatically.

Body: Legal address: 2821 S Parker Rd Aurora, CO 80014 I also can send you my contact number if needed  New York is the biggest retail market in US (24k restaurants only in the City) and hold first position for foreign tourists (60 million in 2016). Literally it's best place to promote our retail product. We need our coin to reduce transaction costs as much as possible. That's why we need our own blockchain.  Once again about airdrop - reOrder is the project from real life and based on real hardware which going to placed in real restaurants. That's why we not going to give away any coins and not going to promote big discounts. We care about our contributors because they expect R Coin will grow on exchange right after ICO. And this what we focused on.

Author: Immorta
Title: ☀️ [ANN] ☀️ reOrder Gateway - USA, NY based Startup|MVP - Nov. 7th
Body: Our technical solution is on enterprise-level scalability and ready to be deplyed by hundreds of thouthands units monthly. From the business perspective it's mostly our commitment to the blockchain & cryptocurrency market and multiple markets approach including cryptocurrency infrastructure (including exchanges), cryptocurrency payment systems, retail automation, restaurant automation and management, food logistics. All this are independent markets wich makes both reOrder ICO  and reOrder technologies extraordinary stable and profitable.  You can read about all that advantages in our whitepaper here http://ico.reorder.world/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/reOrder-WhitePaper-eng.pdf

Author: Immorta
Title: ☀️ [ANN] ☀️ reOrder Gateway - USA, NY based Startup|MVP - Nov. 7th
Body: Actually, we got a lot of advantages for retailers. Right now In-stores, bars, cafes and restaurants by using payment terminals, connected to cloud server.  In 2017 we are introducing other instruments and devices, as well as the blockchain technology and ability to use cryptocurrencies, which allows terminal clients to:  - Increase the sales and efficiency of retail enterprises such as stores, bars, restaurants, hotels, etc. - Enhance the efficiency of staff and quality of services provided to the customers - Speed up the service and, as a result, increase the number of customers, served at the table per unit of time - Collect data for analytical analysis and further improving of business performance - Integration of blockchain technologies and automation the work of staff, reduces transaction costs and generally enhances the quality of service. Our goals are to engage ordinary enterprises in blockchain technologies, provide them with complete industrial solution for daily use and ability to participate in the global process of transition from fiat to cryptocurrency.  This is just a short description of advantages, please ask me about the details you're interested or read our whitepaper for the full picture: http://ico.reorder.world/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/reOrder-WhitePaper-eng.pdf
